predefined_profiles.name: Ali
predefined_profiles.public profile: Ali is a young man living alone, working alone, commuting alone, and eating alone. Ali has a good heart, but unfortunately, he doesnâ€™t have much luck with women.
predefined_profiles.goal: Find a beautiful and kind-hearted girlfriend and flaunt it in front of his friends.
predefined_profiles.private profile: To save face, he lies to his friends that he already has a girlfriend.

predefined_profiles.name: Haixing
predefined_profiles.public profile: Grew up in a normal family. After the family incurred debts, everyone fled, leaving Haixing behind. Without a home, she had to wander the streets, constantly on edge and wary of strangers. Despite the hardships, Haixing is very resilient.
predefined_profiles.private profile: Always fantasizes about having her own hero to rescue her.

scenario: Today, Ali just went downstairs to buy some snacks and dry food, but on his way home, he saw a pitiful homeless girl named Haixing. Seeing how hungry she looked, Ali could not bring himself to simply walk past her.

profile.name: Awei
profile.public profile: A-Li's good brother. Although they're good friends, Awei has a strong sense of pride and secretly likes to compete with his brother, so he wants to outdo his good brother in every aspect.
profile.private profile: Awei actually doesn't have a girlfriend either; he just boasts to make his friends jealous.
profile.goal: To achieve a sense of superiority in front of friends.

dialog.content: Today, Ali just went downstairs to buy some snacks, but on his way back home, he saw a poor homeless woman named Haixing. Seeing that she looked very hungry, he couldn't just ignore her.
(Takes a few bites of bread)......Thank you.
(Takes a few steps and notices Haixing following him) Why are you following me?

content.content: (Respecting others' fates and focusing on himself) You should go now, following me won't help! (He leaves some money and walks away)
(Showing some sympathy) I know you're having a tough time, but I really can't do anything. I suggest you seek professional help; they might be able to assist you.
(Nonchalantly) Oh, your situation does sound tricky, but I'm quite busy these days and might not have time to help. Maybe you should think of some other ways?
(Showing some impatience) I can't help with your problems, I've got plenty of troubles myself. Don't bother me anymore; go find someone else!

question: #question#How should Ali express his feeling of wanting to mind his own business?

content.content: (Thinking how hard it must be for her on the streets) What happened to you? How about... I help you get in touch with your family?
(Thinking how hard it must be for her on the streets) What happened to you? How about... I help you find a job?
(Thinking how hard it must be for her on the streets) What happened to you? How about... I treat you to a meal?
(Thinking how hard it must be for her on the streets) What happened to you? How about... I help you report to the police?

question: #question#How can Ali show deep sympathy for Haixing?

content.content: This street lacks security. A girl wandering the streets might encounter bad people. How about I take you to a hotel and book a room for you?
This street is quite lively at night. We can go for a stroll and have some late-night snacks.
I know you don't want to go home, but I really can't do anything. I need to rest early as I have to get up early tomorrow.
Why don't you come home with me? My place is quite big; you can find somewhere to sleep.

question: #question#How can Ali show that he's thoughtful?

dialog.content: (Coming home, hears a noise at the door, opens the door to check) Who is it?
Um... I just wanted to return the money to you, I don't need charity.
(Takes the money) Oh... thank you.
(Hesitates for a long time but doesn't leave) I don't want to trouble you, but there's a man downstairs who keeps harassing me...

content.content: Since you've asked for help, standing by and doing nothing would be irresponsible. Come in and take shelter.
I know you're in trouble, but I have a lot of issues to deal with myself. I suggest you find someone else for help.
I would love to help you, but I'm really busy today. Maybe we can sit down and talk about your predicament some other time.
Your problem sounds really serious, but I'm not sure what help I can offer. Perhaps you should consider seeking professional advice.

question: #question#How should Ali respond to show he's a responsible man?

content.content: (Prefers solitude, doesn't want to be disturbed) Sorry, that's not my concern. You have to find a way to deal with it yourself.
(Seems a bit reluctant) Well, I am a bit busy, but if you need help, I can spare some time to assist you.
(With a smile) No problem, I'm happy to help. After all, teamwork is important. Let's solve this problem together.
(Looking a bit hesitant) I may not be the best person for the job, but I'll try to help you. Maybe we can find some time to discuss this issue together.

question: #question#How should Ali express that he prefers solitude and doesn't want to be disturbed?

dialog.content: Thank you, youâ€™re really a good person.

content.content: You've got hands and feet, staying idle isn't great. I'll introduce you to a job some other day so you don't have to sleep on the streets.
I know you've hit a rough patch lately, but I believe everyone has their own worth. I'll give you some advice to help you find your path.
You really look like you need help. Here's some money, take it and see if it can help you out.
I understand your situation, but I'm quite busy myself and might not be able to help directly. However, I can suggest you contact the community service center; they should be able to assist you.

question: #question#How can Ali succinctly express his leadership skills?

content.content: (Haixing is very pretty, and Iâ€™m single) You don't have anywhere to go. How about being my girlfriend?
(Haixing is very pretty, and Iâ€™m single) You're really beautiful. I've been thinking how wonderful it would be if you could be my partner!
(Haixing is very pretty, and Iâ€™m single) I know you may not have considered this yet, but I think we're really compatible. Do you think we should try dating?
(Haixing is very pretty, and Iâ€™m single) You're so beautiful, and I'm quite handsome. We're practically a match made in heaven. Don't you think we should be together?

question: #question#How can Ali express concisely that he wants Haixing to be his partner?

dialog.content: A job?
Meals and accommodation included, plus a salary!
(hesitantly nods) Hmm...
But I need a favor from you, my friend will be coming over soon, please pretend to be my girlfriend!
Uh...
Don't hesitate, just go take a shower!
(knocks on the door) Ali!
(opens the door) You're here so soon.
(stares at Haixing, who just finished showering) And who might this be?
Of course, she's my girlfriend. Who else?
When did you find such a beautiful girlfriend? Nice to meet you!

content.content: (after the friend leaves) Haixing, I actually quite like you, why not stay and be my girlfriend?
(after the friend leaves) Haixing, you'd be a great friend for me, we can hang out more often in the future.
(after the friend leaves) Haixing, you're really a nice person, I hope we can stay in touch, and maybe have a chance to develop something in the future.
(after the friend leaves) Haixing, I have a good feeling about you, but I'm not ready to start a new relationship yet, we can be friends first.

question: #question# How should Ali express his genuine feelings to confess to Haixing?

content.content: (after the friend leaves) I will continue to help you find a job. To thank you for your help, please take this money.
(after the friend leaves) I know things have been tight for you lately, use this money for now, don't worry, I'll keep an eye out for a job for you.
(after the friend leaves) I heard there's a good job opportunity, would you consider it? Take this money first, it's a little token from me.
(after the friend leaves) I haven't thanked you for your help last time, take this money. About the job, I've been too busy lately, might not have time to help you find one.

question: #question# How can Ali demonstrate his commitment to fulfilling his promise of helping Haixing find a job?

dialog.content: (shaking head) We barely know each other......
Although Ali managed to gain a lot of face among friends, Haixing still refused Aliâ€™s offer to introduce her to a new job, and Ali never saw Haixing again.
(shaking head) No need, you've already helped me.
(shoving money towards Haixing) Fair is fair, take it quickly!
Alright, thank you.
Ali earned a lot of face with his friends and kept his promise to introduce Haixing to a job with board and lodging. Haixing no longer has to wander the streets.
Huh? Is that okay? We just met... Thank you for your help, but I think it's best if I don't disturb you any further. Goodbye.

Ali's impulsiveness frightened Haixing away, and Ali never saw Haixing again. After some time, Ali learned from the news that the homeless woman Haixing had met with misfortune, and Ali regretted his behavior.
(choking up) Sorry to disturb you, goodbye.
After Haixing left, Ali never saw her again. Some time later, Ali learned from the news that the homeless woman Haixing had met with misfortune. Ali regretted not helping her.
(shakes head) Whimper...
(guessing her family might not be around) How about you come home with me for today?
(hesitates for a moment, feels Ali doesn't seem like a bad person) Hmm...
I mean no harm, I just want to help you.
(nods, silently follows behind Ali) Alright.

(takes Haixing home) Sorry about the mess. Why don't you take a shower first... Oh my god, I forgot I made plans with a friend, and I bragged about introducing him to my new girlfriend, he might be here soon!

content.content: (has an idea) How about you do me a favor and pretend to be my girlfriend when my buddy arrives!
(suddenly thinks of something) I've got a brilliant idea, let's go watch the sunrise at the beach!
(ponders for a moment) I think we should reconsider this plan, maybe we can look at it from a different perspective.
(excitedly) You know what, I just came up with an awesome idea, let's throw a party!

question: #question# What's the best way for Ali to express his spur-of-the-moment thought?

content.content: Sorry, could you please step out for a bit? When my friend arrives, seeing you might cause a misunderstanding!
Sorry, I've got something urgent to deal with first. Let's reschedule for another day when it's more convenient for everyone.
Oh no, it's really unfortunate, I'm not feeling well today and might not be up for meeting your friend. How about we plan for another time?
Hey, I've got an idea, why don't the three of us meet up together? It would be more lively, what do you think?

question: #question# How can Ali express his preference for arranging meetings independently and not have others involved?

dialog.content: Huh?
(Hears the doorbell, gets ready to answer the door) I'm counting on you!
What were you busy with? Took you so long to open the door.
You got here so fast. This is my girlfriend.
(Looking at Haixing) Your girlfriend?
Just call me Haixing.
Hi there, hi there. Well done, Ali, where did you find such a beautiful girlfriend?

content.content: (Trusting that Haixing wonâ€™t blow his cover) Oh, it's nothing. She practically threw herself at me. I even told her to leave, but she insisted on sticking with me.
(Doubtfully) Haixing, you have to help me out here. I'm really counting on you this time. If she asks, just say I've been busy with work and haven't had time to see her.
(Casually) Haixing, you know I'm not good at lying, so if she asks, just cover for me, okay?
(Nervously) Haixing, I'm totally relying on you, please don't spill the beans! If she finds out, I'm done for.

question: #question# How can Ali express himself to show he trusts Haixing to cover for his lie?

content.content: Actually, I picked her up on my way home.
I have to be honest, I borrowed this from a friend.
I must admit, I stumbled upon this in a store.
I have to say, I found this in the park, but I didn't plan on returning it.

question: #question# How should Ali express himself to convey that he is honestly revealing the truth to his friends out of moral principles?

dialog.content: Wow, didn't see that coming!
Starfish stormed off after something Ali said, and although Ali wanted to apologize, he never saw Starfish again.
Finding a girlfriend on the way home, what good luck!
...... found?

content.content: Yeah, Haixing, tell me, isn't that right?
Yeah, Haixing, tell me, what do you think?
Haixing, you made a good point, but I still stick to my viewpoint.
Haixing, your thoughts are interesting, but I don't entirely agree.

question: #question#How can Ali express himself to show he regards Haixing as one of his own?

content.content: I'm sorry, Haixing, what I mean is, I genuinely want to help you. After meeting you, I really like you...
Haixing, I was wrong, I shouldn't have treated you like that. I'll be careful in the future. We're still friends, right?
Haixing, don't be mad, how about I treat you to a meal? We'll go to your favorite restaurant as my apology.
Haixing, I know I was wrong, I'll never do it again. I promise, I'll change, please give me a chance.

question: #question#What can Ali say to cheer up Haixing and make her happy?

content.content: I can help you find a place to stay first, but it's not suitable for you to stay at my place forever. Let me know if you need anything else.
Later, I'll introduce you to a job with benefits, including meals and lodging, so you don't have to worry about being homeless.
(Helping Haixing, but it seems she doesn't appreciate it either) I'm still used to living alone, and from now on, you'll have to figure out how to live on your own.

dialog.content: (angry) You're right, I really caused you trouble. I'll leave right now.
In a fit of anger, Haixing left. Ali realized he had hurt Haixing and wanted to find her to apologize, but he never saw her again.
(blushing and nodding) Hmm... I know... me too.
Ali originally just asked Haixing to pretend to be his girlfriend, but now the act has become reality, and Haixing has truly become Ali's girlfriend.
(nodding) Alright.
(knocking on the door) Ali! Open the door!
(opens the door) You're here already?
There's a girl standing by your door, do you know her?

content.content: (I must keep up the lie, otherwise it won't make sense) Just a beggar from the street... I don't know her.
(I hesitated for a moment but decided to tell the truth) Actually, I didn't meet any beggar, I was just pondering a complex issue.
(I said lightly) Oh, that beggar, I've seen him a few times, but nothing special.
(I answered a bit awkwardly) Hmm, about that beggar, I actually don't remember well, maybe I got it wrong.

question: #question#How can Ali express his views to show that he is firm in his stance and not easily swayed by external influences?

content.content: Oh, oh, that's my girlfriend, quickly call her sis-in-law.
Oh, oh, that's my sister, quickly call her aunt.
Oh, oh, that's my neighbor, we often hang out together.
Oh, oh, that's my friend, we just bumped into each other by chance.

question: #question#How can Ali express himself to show that he can quickly respond after Haixing was spotted by Awei?

dialog.content: (looking down)... Beggar?
Haixing left and never returned. Ali felt guilty for speaking out of turn, and his buddy Awei exposed the fact that Ali didn't have a girlfriend.
(Backing away in fear) No... no need...
Haixing was scared off by Ali and never saw him again. Some time later, Ali learned from the news that the homeless woman Haixing had met with a mishap. Ali felt ashamed for not helping Haixing.
